name: .ARCHIVE
summary: Learn about .ARCHIVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You should not attempt to open ARCHIVE files since Cyberpunk 2077 references the files to load mods that modify the gameplay. However, you can manage ARCHIVE files with the Nexus Mods Vortex mod manager in Windows.
You can also place ARCHIVE files in the following directory for Cyberpunk 2077 to reference and load them:

If you need to view the contents of an ARCHIVE file, you can extract its contents with a Zip compression utility, such as Windows File Explorer or Apple Archive Utility (you may need to rename the .archive file extension to .zip. However, if you modify the contents of the ARCHIVE file, you may break the mod.
